title: Premiere: Gossip Column – Medical Medley
content:
London outfit, Gossip Column impressed last year with their debut track The Beginning Of Everything, earning rave reviews from Gold Flake Paint.

They return in 2015 with their sophomore release, Medical Medley, a pensive and melancholic three minutes that enthrals from start to finish. The drifting, crooning vocals are restrained and dreary, encasing the entire track in a beautifully somber haze that refuses to let go. It isn’t until the closing section when the lyrics “I haven’t thought for you for days” shower the track with the welcomed optimism of moving on. Stream Medical Medley below:
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d46
